main_title: Dommatos: Control your smart home from anywhere
main_subtitle: Manage lights, security and more with a single app. Easy, fast and secure.
why_subtitle: Dommatos gives you total control of your smart home, with security, comfort and efficiency in one place.
why_card1_desc: Manage all your smart devices from a single app.
why_card2_desc: Intuitive interface for the whole family.
why_card3_desc: Create routines and personalized scenarios for your home.
why_card4_desc: Your data and your home always protected.
about_desc: With Dommatos you can control lights, cameras, sensors and more, from anywhere at any time. Our app is designed to give you peace of mind and comfort in your smart home.
download_desc: Available for iOS and Android. Take control of your home in your pocket and live the Dommatos experience.
solar_desc: We offer professional installation of solar panels for your home or business, with flexible financing options. Save on your energy bill and help the environment with cutting-edge technology and personalized advice.
